## Review

_Congratulations, you've completed this exercise and learned the fundamentals of building a .NET console app in a C# workspace._

<img src="https://octodex.github.com/images/jetpacktocat.png" alt="celebrate" width=200 align=right>

Here's a recap of your accomplishments:

- Configured workspace setup for C# Dev Kit.
- Created and ran a .NET console app from a template.
- Added user input and dynamic output in `Program.cs`.
- Validated behavior using run and debug workflows.
- Opened a pull request with your completed app.
